abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Durant, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1678) of Peter J. Durant and David F. DeCoste for legislation relative to the licensing of ammunition sales.  Public Safety and Homeland Security.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security
